name: Cubic Ball (7Mar)
description:
When Ever You Die The Level Gets More Harder!!

!!!!The Game is Not Stable in The Browser!!!!

This Game is made for the BTP game jam

with the theme Less is More and this is my first game jam game and its really short but that's what i can in 3D

Controls:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump - Space

Move The Camera - hold LMB

Reset The Camera - RMB

Credits:

Menu music By: Final Gate Studios

Soundtrack By: Nicole Marie T

I Do not Know if the Game will work in Mac Os or Linux i Have Windows Sorry if it doesn't Work and For my Bad English
